author: Keon Parsa
comment: Maybe add a snake rather than a worm, so like a alternative skin pack.  Also, maybe add a way so you can tap instead of swipe.  I also noticed that if you make a quick 180, you die. Great app and graphics.

reply.author: Teensy Studios
reply.content: Hello Keon, thank you for the suggestions. Its really valuable for us and your feedback would surely be considered for the next release. Thank you

title: Fun

author: Martyn Wright
comment: Works ok but have to turn screen of to exit and seems a bit clunky on Sony sw3

reply.author: Teensy Studios
reply.content: Hello Martyn, please cover the watch face with your palm to exit the game. Thank you

title: Ok but

author: Troy Sweers
comment: Game doesn't even launch on my Gear Live... screen just goes black and it never loads. Fix this, and I'll fix the rating.

reply.author: Teensy Studios
reply.content: Hello Troy, Can you please try it again. We have tested it for Gear Live and its working fine at our end. Can you please send us an image at feedback@teensystudios.com. Thanks

title: Wish it worked...

author: Jawad Ashraf
comment: Retro fun! Enjoying this quick blast from the past. Good work people. Any chance of some more modes?
title: Flashback! Nice game!
